metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass the arm-ttk test, 'Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded'. Instead the `workspace-location` derived from the log analytics workspace is used.
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
subscription id where Microsoft Sentinel is configured
resource group name where Microsoft Sentinel is configured
the log analytics workspace enabled for Microsoft Sentinel

connectorUiConfig.title: Cyfirma Brand Intelligence Conntector
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: The [Cyfirma DeCYFIR/DeTCT Alerts] data connector enables seamless log ingestion from the DeCYFIR/DeTCT API into Microsoft Sentinel. Built on the Microsoft Sentinel Codeless Connector Platform, it leverages the DeCYFIR/DeTCT Alerts API to retrieve logs. Additionally, it supports DCR-based [ingestion time transformations](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/logs/custom-logs-overview), which parse security data into a custom table during ingestion. This eliminates the need for query-time parsing, enhancing performance and efficiency.

graphQueries.metricName: Total Domain IT Asset Alerts logs received
Total Executive People Alerts logs received
Total Product Solution Alerts logs received
Total Social Handlers Alerts logs received
Total Malicious Mobile Apps Alerts logs received

sampleQueries.description: Get Sample of Domain IT Asset Alerts logs
Get Sample of Executive People Alerts logs
Get Sample of Product Solution Alerts logs
Get Sample of Social Handlers Alerts logs
Get Sample of Malicious Mobile Apps Alerts logs

dataTypes.name: CyfirmaBIDomainITAssetAlerts_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
CyfirmaBIDomainITAssetAlerts_CL
       | where TimeGenerated > ago(12h)                | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: CyfirmaBIExecutivePeopleAlerts_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
CyfirmaBIExecutivePeopleAlerts_CL
       | where TimeGenerated > ago(12h)                | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: CyfirmaBIProductSolutionAlerts_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
CyfirmaBIProductSolutionAlerts_CL
       | where TimeGenerated > ago(12h)                | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: CyfirmaBISocialHandlersAlerts_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
CyfirmaBISocialHandlersAlerts_CL
       | where TimeGenerated > ago(12h)                | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: CyfirmaBIMaliciousMobileAppsAlerts_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
CyfirmaBIMaliciousMobileAppsAlerts_CL
       | where TimeGenerated > ago(12h)                | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: Read and Write permissions are required.

instructionSteps.title: Cyfirma Brand Intelligence Conntector
instructionSteps.description: Connect to Cyfirma Brand Intelligence Conntector

dataFlows.transformKql:
source
| extend TimeGenerated=alert_created_date
| extend alert_title=['title']
| extend category = 'Brand Intelligence'
| project-away alert_created_date, ['title'], notes

source
| extend TimeGenerated=alert_created_date
| extend alert_title=['title']
| project-away alert_created_date, ['title'], notes

source
| extend TimeGenerated=alert_created_date
| extend alert_title=['title']
| project-away alert_created_date, ['title'], notes

source
| extend TimeGenerated=alert_created_date
| extend alert_title=['title']
| project-away alert_created_date, ['title'], notes

source
| extend TimeGenerated=alert_created_date
| extend alert_title=['title']
| project-away alert_created_date, ['title'], notes

schema.name: CyfirmaBIDomainITAssetAlerts_CL
schema.description: This custom table provide the Domain IT Assets data from the Cyfirma.

schema.name: CyfirmaBIExecutivePeopleAlerts_CL
schema.description: This custom table provides Executive People Alerts data from Cyfirma

schema.name: CyfirmaBIProductSolutionAlerts_CL
schema.description: This custom table provides Product Solution Alerts data from Cyfirma

schema.name: CyfirmaBISocialHandlersAlerts_CL
schema.description: This custom table provides Social Handlers Alerts data from Cyfirma

schema.name: CyfirmaBIMaliciousMobileAppsAlerts_CL
schema.description: This custom table provides Malicious Mobile Apps Alerts data from Cyfirma
